body: IS a mod that can download any world into single player allowed? I wouldn't use it for actually using the maps elsewhere, just to run around/ practice. Actually also for me to download my worlds from servers....
body_tagged: IS a mod that can download any world into single player allowed? I wouldn't use it for actually using the maps elsewhere, just to run around/ practice. Actually also for me to download my worlds from servers....
title: Is This Allowed?

replies.body: This is not allowed on Avicus, using it is detectable and bannable. Feel free to use scrim servers to practice maps though.
replies.body_tagged: This is not allowed on Avicus, using it is detectable and bannable. Feel free to use scrim servers to practice maps though.

replies.body: Go to the scrims tab at the top bar on the forums after making a team, you will be able to book servers at certain times. When it's your time do /server scrim0[number]
replies.body_tagged: Go to the scrims tab at the top bar on the forums after making a team, you will be able to book servers at certain times. When it's your time do /server scrim0[number]

replies.body:
You can get map downloads by requesting them from the creator

You cant get downloads for tourney maps, thr creator himself is not allowed to give out downloads.

replies.body: If you want practice, Avicus has scrim servers to do it. In the Map Making sub-foroum you can see a lot of TM maps, you must talk with thw map creator to dowload these maps.
